basics.name: Richard Roncancio
basics.label: Computer Science Engineer
basics.summary: Computer science engineer with 6+ years of experience in front end development with a deep knowledge in html, css and the javascript programming language. I enjoy learning as much as possible, share the knowledge with other team members and solve hard to solve problems in order to meet the user requirements.

work.summary: Started as a junior front end engineer among my responsibilities are the development of functional user interfaces with HTML, CSS and javascript, front end implementation on ruby on rails apps using erb and haml, building full featured client side applications with several different libraries and frameworks such as Backbone.js and Marionette, ember.js, angular.js and React.js meeting user requirements in creative, efficient, intuitive and aesthetically pleasing ways.
highlights: Built our base css starting boilerplate in sass (scss), using SMACSS metodology and following the BEM naming convention.
Successfully lead and built several web pages and client side applications with html, css and javascript, also using several libraries such as AngularJS and React.js.

Learned and introduced several new technologies and frameworks to our front end stack including SASS, Backbone.js, emberjs, angularjs, Reactjs, vuejs and new tooling such as Babel js and among others.
Helped to evaluate and train several new hires for the front end department.

volunteer.summary: Barranquilla's first javascript community for people to learn and share and the javascript programming language

courses: Rethinking Async, Functional JS and Node Fundamentals

skills.name: Front end Development
keywords: Knowledge of web libraries such as AngularJS, emberJs, React, Redux, MobX.
